title: nn.softmax does not take dimension
body_html: One thing which is so valuable in some problems, is that we are able to apply the softmax operation along a predefined dimension. Tesnorflow has this parameter in definition of the softmax layer but pytorch has not. Good to have this feature in next release of pytorch!
body_text: One thing which is so valuable in some problems, is that we are able to apply the softmax operation along a predefined dimension. Tesnorflow has this parameter in definition of the softmax layer but pytorch has not. Good to have this feature in next release of pytorch!
body: One thing which is so valuable in some problems, is that we are able to apply the softmax operation along a predefined dimension. [Tesnorflow](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/nn/softmax) has this parameter in definition of the softmax layer but pytorch has not. Good to have this feature in next release of pytorch!
